name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-pi-canvas
title: PiCanvas - Tabbed Page Sections
shortDescription: Organize SharePoint page sections and web parts into a tabbed interface with permission-based visibility, templates, and full customization.
longDescription: PiCanvas is a SharePoint Framework web part that organizes page content into a clean tabbed interface. It supports permission-based tab visibility (Owners/Members/Visitors/Custom groups), multiple tab styles (default, pills, underline, boxed), vertical and horizontal layouts, and full color/typography customization. Features include template export/import, Mermaid diagram rendering, section grouping, theme auto-detection, and web part reuse across tabs.
